scripts.install-latest: npm install babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babelify browserify es5-shim http-server node-sass react react-dom uglify-js watchify --save-dev
scripts.install-local: npm install babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babelify es5-shim react react-dom --save-dev
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js -t babelify | uglifyjs -mc > public/js/script.min.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
